{{infobox character | people=[[Númenóreans|Númenórean]] | name=Gimilkhâd | image= | caption= | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[Númenor]] | affiliation=[[King's Men]] | language=[[Adûnaic]] | birth={{SA|3044}} | birthlocation= | rule= | death={{SA|3243}} | deathlocation= | age=199 | notablefor= | house=[[House of Elros]] | parentage=[[Ar-Gimilzôr]] and [[Inzilbêth]]{{UT|Kings}}, entry XXIII ''Ar-Gimilzôr (Tar-Telemnar)'' | siblings=[[Tar-Palantir|Inziladûn]] | spouse= | children=[[Ar-Pharazôn|Pharazôn]]{{UT|Kings}}, entry XXIV ''Tar-Palantir (Ar-Inziladûn)'' | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Gimilkhâd''' was the younger son of Queen [[Inzilbêth]] and King [[Ar-Gimilzôr]] of [[Númenor]]. His older brother [[Inziladûn]] followed his mother's beliefs (she was secretly one of the [[Faithful]]). Inziladûn took the royal title of [[Tar-Palantir]] and attempted to lead the [[Númenóreans]] back to reverence for the [[Valar]]. However, Gimilkhâd believed in the ways of his father, became the leader of the [[King's Men]], and opposed the policies of his brother. His son usurped the [[Sceptre of Númenor|Sceptre]] of Tar-Palantir's daughter [[Tar-Míriel|Míriel]], took the title of [[Ar-Pharazôn]], and brought destruction upon the island realm.{{S|Akallabeth}} == Etymology == ''Gimilkhâd'' is an [[Adûnaic]] name, but its meaning is not glossed. Paul Strack notices the first element must be ''[[gimil]]'' ("stars"), but it is not clear what the last element ''khâd'' means.{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://www.eldamo.org/content/words/word-1629452761.html|articlename=Ad. In ''The Silmarillion'' it is stated that "Gimilkhâd died two years before his two hundredth year". {{References}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Gimilkhad}} [[Category:Adûnaic names]] [[Category:Characters in The Silmarillion]] [[Category:House of Elros]] [[Category:King's Men]] [[Category:Second Age characters]] [[Category:Númenóreans]] [[de:Gimilkhâd]] [[fi:Gimilkhâd]] [[fr:encyclo/personnages/hommes/2a/numenoreens/gimilkhad]]
